hibernate-mapping.query: select P.idPersonalInformation from PersonalInformation P where P.userMaster.id = ?
from AclSid where upper(sidType.type) like ? and ownerSid in(select id from PersonalInformation where userMaster.id=? ) and aclObjectIdentity.domainObjectId=? and permission in(:param_3)
from PersonalInformation P where upper(P.employeeName) like '%' || ? || '%'
